# This package allow you to find the price market of criptocurrencies

```{r setup}
library(CriptoChange)
```

Examples of function of CriptoChange
```{r}
df <- Cripto_time_series(cripto = "ETH",
                         market = "MXN",
                         temp = "MONTHLY")

results <- Cripto_seasonal_analysis(df = df, temp = "MONTHLY")
```
